briefTitle: A Trial Evaluating Compatibility and Safety of FIAsp and Insulin Aspart With an External Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion System in Adult Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
officialTitle: A 6-week Randomised, Double-blind, Parallel-group Trial Evaluating Compatibility and Safety of FIAsp and Insulin Aspart With an External Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion System in Adult Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
summary: This trial is conducted in Europe and the United States of America (USA). The aim of this trial is to evaluate compatibility and safety of FIAsp (faster-acting insulin aspart) and insulin aspart (NovoRapid®) with an external continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion (CSII) system in adult subjects with type 1 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Microscopically Confirmed Episodes of Infusion Set Occlusions
